orig_text:
The Server Name Indication (SNI) extension [RFC6066] i defines a
   mechanism for a client to tell a (D)TLS server the name of the server
   it wants to contact.
correct_text:
The Server Name Indication (SNI) extension [RFC6066] defines a
   mechanism for a client to tell a (D)TLS server the name of the server
   it wants to contact.
